name: integrator-api
description: Integrator untuk UAS Interoperabilitas - Banyuwangi Marketplace

scripts.test: echo "Testing endpoints..." && node -e "const fetch = require('node-fetch'); Promise.all(['http://localhost:3000/api/health', 'http://localhost:3000/api/integrate'].map(url => fetch(url).then(r => console.log(url, r.status))))"
